behavioral.description: Behavioral interviews focus on past experiences and how you handled various work situations
preparation_tips: Prepare 5-7 detailed STAR examples covering different competencies
Focus on specific, measurable results
Practice telling stories concisely (2-3 minutes each)
Be honest about challenges and what you learned

technical.description: Technical interviews assess your technical knowledge, problem-solving abilities, and coding skills
technical.question_format: Coding problems, system design, technical concepts
preparation_tips: Practice coding problems on platforms like LeetCode
Review fundamental data structures and algorithms
Be ready to explain your thought process out loud
Ask clarifying questions before starting to code

system_design.description: System design interviews evaluate your ability to architect large-scale distributed systems
system_design.question_format: Design a system like Twitter, Uber, or Netflix
preparation_tips: Learn about scalability patterns and trade-offs
Practice drawing system architectures
Understand load balancing, caching, and database design
Think about both high-level design and detailed components

case_study.description: Case study interviews test analytical thinking and business acumen through real-world scenarios
preparation_tips: Practice structuring your approach to problems
Learn common business frameworks (SWOT, Porter's 5 Forces, etc.)
Think out loud and engage the interviewer
Consider multiple perspectives and trade-offs

panel.description: Panel interviews involve multiple interviewers and may combine different interview types
preparation_tips: Make eye contact with all panel members
Address questions to the person who asked, but include others
Be prepared for different styles and perspectives
Stay calm and confident with multiple personalities

content_quality.description: Relevance, depth, and accuracy of the answer content

scoring_guidelines.3-4: Basic understanding with some relevant points
scoring_guidelines.5-6: Good understanding with mostly relevant and accurate content
scoring_guidelines.7-8: Strong understanding with detailed, relevant, and accurate content
scoring_guidelines.9-10: Exceptional understanding with comprehensive, insightful content

structure_clarity.description: Organization, logical flow, and clarity of communication

scoring_guidelines.1-2: Disorganized, hard to follow, unclear communication
scoring_guidelines.3-4: Some structure but lacks clarity in places
scoring_guidelines.5-6: Generally well-organized with clear main points
scoring_guidelines.7-8: Well-structured, logical flow, easy to follow
scoring_guidelines.9-10: Exceptionally clear structure, compelling narrative flow

specificity.description: Use of specific examples, metrics, and concrete details

scoring_guidelines.3-4: Some specific details but mostly general statements
scoring_guidelines.5-6: Good use of specific examples and details
scoring_guidelines.7-8: Strong specificity with concrete examples and metrics
scoring_guidelines.9-10: Exceptional specificity with compelling, detailed examples

impact_results.description: Demonstration of meaningful impact and measurable results

scoring_guidelines.1-2: No clear impact or results mentioned
scoring_guidelines.3-4: Some impact mentioned but not well-defined
scoring_guidelines.5-6: Clear impact with some measurable results
scoring_guidelines.7-8: Strong impact with well-defined, measurable results
scoring_guidelines.9-10: Exceptional impact with compelling, quantified results

scoring_guidelines.7-8: Good self-reflection with clear learning takeaways
scoring_guidelines.9-10: Exceptional self-awareness with deep insights and growth
